channel.title: Post Subscribe Option
channel.description:
I think there should be a way that you can keep the threads that you like in a specific folder. This would be like Vbulletin where you can subscribe for them. It would be good because then you won't have to go find the threads, and you won't forget about them. It would be a quick reference. Is there anyway to do this?
Thanks Leader
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 02:26:13 AM[/size][hr]Can someone please move this to the other category and then to General Site Discussion?

item.title: Post Subscribe Option

I think there should be a way that you can keep the threads that you like in a specific folder. This would be like Vbulletin where you can subscribe for them. It would be good because then you won’t have to go find the threads, and you won’t forget about them. It would be a quick reference. Is there anyway to do this?
